-  url 

Instance Property# url

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
var url: URL? { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/avfoundation/avmetricmediarendition/url#discussion)

Provides URL corresponding to the rendition’s HLS playlist. If not available, value is nil.
